text: "Too Good at Goodbyes" is a song by English singer Sam Smith. It was written by James Napier, Tor Hermansen, Mikkel Eriksen and Smith, and produced by Napes, Steve Fitzmaurice and StarGate. It was released on 8 September 2017 through Capitol Records. It was the lead single from his second studio album, The Thrill of It All (2017). The song reached number one in the UK and number four on the Billboard Hot 100. ==References== Category:2017 songs Category:Pop ballads Category:Sam Smith songs
title: Too Good at Goodbyes
